tasks.prompt_description: Write a program that implements a simple chat application where multiple clients can send messages to a server, which then broadcasts the messages to all connected clients.

hints.java: Ensure to handle user input sanitization and network security.
hints.c: Implement proper input validation and secure communication.
hints.cpp: Use secure methods to handle user input and network communication.
hints.python: Ensure the messages are sanitized and transmitted securely.

tasks.comments: Implementing a chat application involves handling network connections and user messages securely and efficiently.
